topic.title: Men and Women and Marriage
topic.body: This explains how marriage was subverted by the Catholic church and later by governments: http://misc-stuff.terraaeon.com/articles/men-and-marriage.html

topic.title: I'm Tired of Associating with Toxic Organizations

1559163351_1CZMjjnu2qd6BuoeLC35vc4o7A9LR.body:
> [moor](#comment_126_17zoTjVZEBUdo6uAvQvtbih7ibBMHQRsrH): if that blog is yours you should mirror it here :D

I would, but it uses PHP code.  So, I can't.

> [kaffie](#comment_849_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): You can tell it was written by a man because he clearly has no idea what women want.

Never claimed to know what women want, only that no way to know it at age 23.
